title: "Fraking's Pink Drill Beats for Suzanne G. Comin's partnership."
subtitle: The oil giant Baker Hughes donated $100,000 to Suzanne G. Comin and is now planning to distribute 1,000 bits of pink digger.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The oil giant Baker Hughes donated $100,000 to Suzanne G. Comin and is now planning to distribute 1,000 bits of pink digger.
